infos.value: Lady Mach√©rie...
Queen Helena!?
No matter what befalls us, I wish for Sterne to live.
Please...I require your assistance.
Queen Helena... No, Queen Mother, please rest easy.
My life is already indebted to your son, Mont. So I will return the favor.
W-wait!
Stay your swords, we shall not fight.
But Lord Sterne... I can still fight.
I will protect the Queen Mother.
My apologies, but we shall not go further.
I am not like Father... I'm not like that man.
I would never abandon Mother! Never!
What're you doing here? We're to take Helena and Sterne...
We think not.
What did you say!?
Any grievances can be taken up with me personally.
And just to let you know, I have a hard time settling grievances gently.
Tch...
These two are my guests. Treat them with our greatest hospitality. Is that clear?
Yes, Your Highness. It shall be done.
